text: haey saampow ban doek puokke( anak mean chomnue)thveudamnaer kat tukarolk thom brieb dauchchea phnom haey nuo h ban srekhaw kaun robsa keat khn delke ban sthetnow knong krom del dakakhluon chenhpi banda anak mean chomnue tha ao kaunosamleanh. chaur laengchiah cheamuoy puok yeung haey kom now cheamuoy puok del kmean chomnue aoy saoh
